title: God-King Garen sound issues.
body: The sound files for God-King Garen are very buggy. Often he will speak two to three voice lines at the same time. For instance, if I move, use Garen's Q and his passive activates around the same time, Garen will say all three lines of dialog overlapping on each other. Additionally, more than 70% of the taunt emotes I perform he doesn't say anything at all. And when he hits a cannon minion or tower a loud squeak noise like a bird's chirp comes out of nowhere. Please fix this for this wonderful LEGENDARY skin.

replies.body:
Yeah it's annoying and very noticeable since it happens pretty much any time you use an ability. I'm not sure how riot let this through without fixing it.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
